name: r6maps
//1: When changing version # search and replace in this file and index.html.  This is hacky for now but it avoided some complexities.
description: Rainbow Six Siege map quick references

scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:main && npm run build:css:about && npm run build:css:stats
scripts.build:js:common: npm run build:js:mkdir && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o ./site/js/release.2.4.1/common.min.js --source-map  "filename='./site/js/release.2.4.1/common.min.js.map', url='common.min.js.map', includeSources=true" ./dev/js/common/common.global.js ./dev/js/common/common.helpers.js ./dev/js/lang-terms/lang-terms.js ./dev/js/lang-terms/lang-terms.*.js
scripts.build:js:main: npm run build:js:mkdir && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o ./site/js/release.2.4.1/main.min.js --source-map  "filename='./site/js/release.2.4.1/main.min.js.map', url='main.min.js.map', includeSources=true" ./dev/js/main/main.map-data.js ./dev/js/main/main.map-render.js ./dev/js/main/main.controls.js ./dev/js/main/main.select-maps.js ./dev/js/main/main.drawing.js ./dev/js/main/main.sessions.js ./dev/js/main/main.js
scripts.build:js:about: npm run build:js:mkdir && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o ./site/js/release.2.4.1/about.min.js --source-map "filename='./site/js/release.2.4.1/about.min.js.map', url='about.min.js.map', includeSources=true" ./dev/js/about/about.js
scripts.build:js:stats: npm run build:js:mkdir && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o ./site/js/release.2.4.1/stats.min.js --source-map "filename='./site/js/release.2.4.1/stats.min.js.map', url='stats.min.js.map', includeSources=true" ./dev/js/stats/stats.meta-data.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.render.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.controls.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.operators.data.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.map.data.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.api.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.map.render.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.operators.render.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.operators.chart.js ./dev/js/stats/stats.js
scripts.build:js: npm run test:js && npm run build:js:common && npm run build:js:main && npm run build:js:stats && npm run build:js:about
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js

author: Jon Capa
